trans-unit.source: Implements low-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Operazioni di personalizzazione di basso livello implementa.

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe implementa la logica necessaria per eseguire operazioni di personalizzazione di livello inferiore.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the WebPartPersonalization class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe gestisce il ciclo di vita di alto livello di personalizzazione, è la classe WebPartPersonalization che è responsabile dell'implementazione effettivamente i passaggi fisici necessari per eseguire operazioni di personalizzazione specifiche.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartPersonalization class in turn relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartPersonalization si basa a sua volta in un'implementazione di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>per comunicare con l'archivio dati sottostante per informazioni sulla personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, it creates an instance of the WebPartPersonalization class that you can use by referencing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza l'implementazione predefinita del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, crea un'istanza della classe WebPartPersonalization facendo riferimento a cui è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per accedere al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>proprietà, è possibile specificare `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on whose behalf the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance will carry out personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un'istanza di questa classe e associa il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo conto il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>istanza eseguirà le operazioni di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> used to manage the personalization information
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> consentono di gestire le informazioni sulla personalizzazione

trans-unit.source: owner is .
trans-unit.target: owneris .

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Applica i dati di personalizzazione per l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>è impostata su `true`, questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>istanza per applicare lo stato di personalizzazione per il controllo di Web part fornito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Applica i dati di personalizzazione specificata <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllare quando richiesto dall'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derived class when requested to do so by the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato per applicare i dati di personalizzazione a un singolo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derivata quando richiesto dall'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>è impostata su `true`, questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>istanza per applicare lo stato di personalizzazione per il controllo di Web part fornito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: Le Web part di controllare a quali la personalizzazione viene da applicare ai dati.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di applicare lo stato di personalizzazione a un controllo di Web part che non è gestito dall'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'utente è autorizzato ad accedere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ambito.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce `true` se l'utente è autorizzato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>immettere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>ambito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope and caches the information.
trans-unit.target: La prima volta che viene chiamata la proprietà, vengono determinate del verso destra per immettere utente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>ambito e lo memorizza nella cache le informazioni.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dizionario è stato modificato dopo la prima volta che questa proprietà viene chiamata, le modifiche non vengono visualizzate nelle chiamate successive a questa proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'utente è autorizzato ad accedere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ambito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance to the scope specified.
trans-unit.target: Modifica della pagina corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> istanza all'ambito specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo diventa il nuovo ambito specificato dall'ambito di personalizzazione della pagina attualmente in esecuzione il `newScope` parametro.

trans-unit.source: This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il metodo di supporto protetto che viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo protetto esiste per la gestione di estendibilità futura se sono presenti più di due possibili ambiti per alternare.

trans-unit.source: If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: Se l'ambito corrente e `newScope` sono lo stesso valore, quindi questo metodo non esegue alcuna operazione.

trans-unit.source: The new personalization scope for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo ambito di personalizzazione per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: If attempting to switch from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di passare da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> eseguite <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ambito, l'utente corrente non dispone della funzionalità di utente di immettere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ambito.

trans-unit.source: scope is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: scopenon è un membro valido del enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Estrae lo stato di personalizzazione da un controllo di Web part e viene applicato a un secondo controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo estrae lo stato di personalizzazione da `webPartA` e si applica a `webPartB`.

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo presuppone che `webPartA` e `webPartB` sono dello stesso tipo.

trans-unit.source: If the Web Parts controls are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Se i controlli Web part sono <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlli, il metodo di copia dello stato di personalizzazione dal controllo figlio eseguito il wrapping in `webPartA` al controllo figlio eseguito il wrapping in `webPartB`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Come parte dell'operazione di copia, `webPartB` viene contrassegnato come "dirty".

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati di personalizzazione di controlli Web part.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di Web part che riceve i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Either webPartA or webPartB is .
trans-unit.target: Either webPartA or webPartB is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la personalizzazione deve essere abilitata per la proprietà associata <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se la personalizzazione deve essere abilitata per l'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo è una sottile ma importante distinzione rispetto all'intento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata solo prima del completamento dei <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that the Enabled property must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element if personalization should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: In pratica, ciò significa che la proprietà Enabled deve essere impostata nel markup della pagina sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento se la personalizzazione deve essere disabilitata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile impostare questa proprietà durante il `PreInit` fase del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è abilitata la personalizzazione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di impostare questa proprietà dopo aver associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>metodo è stato completato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Assicura che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> istanza è stata completata l'inizializzazione o che l'utente corrente disponga dei diritti per modificare lo stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica il tipo di controllo deve essere apportato.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> istanza di un'autorizzazione utente di immettere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ambito.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il diritto utente è rappresentato dalla stringa "enterSharedScope" nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Estrae i dati di personalizzazione dal padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>proprietà è impostata su `true`, e lo stato di personalizzazione non viene reimpostato durante la richiesta di pagina (ad esempio quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>proprietà è `false`), questo metodo estrae i dati di personalizzazione dal padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo durante la relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>istanza per estrarre lo stato di personalizzazione dal padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Estrae i dati di personalizzazione di un controllo di Web part quando richiesto dall'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>è impostata su `true`, e lo stato di personalizzazione non viene reimpostato durante la richiesta di pagina (ad esempio quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>proprietà `false`), questo metodo estrae i dati di personalizzazione dal controllo Web part specificato da `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>istanza per estrarre lo stato di personalizzazione dal controllo Web part fornito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Web part contenente i dati di personalizzazione da estrarre.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di estrarre lo stato di personalizzazione da un controllo Web part che non è gestito dall'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il filtro di autorizzazione, se disponibile, associata al controllo di Web part specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo recupera il filtro di autorizzazione, se presente, associato al controllo di Web part identificato da `webPartID`.

trans-unit.source: Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ogni controllo Web part serializzato e gestito dalla personalizzazione è associato un `webPartID` parametro.

trans-unit.source: At run time, a page's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: In fase di esecuzione, una pagina <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo è possibile filtrare i controlli visualizzati in una pagina per determinare se ogni controllo Web part è autorizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni di autorizzazione sono archiviate sotto forma di stringa nei dati di cui è associati a ogni controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: L'ID del controllo Web part associato al filtro da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Il filtro di autorizzazione per il controllo di Web part specificato.

trans-unit.source: webPartID is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: webPartIDè o una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current page and personalization scope have associated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la pagina corrente e l'ambito di personalizzazione sono associati dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di un metodo pratico per determinare se la combinazione di pagina e l'ambito corrente dispone di dati di personalizzazione associati.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> on the provider to determine whether data exists.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, le chiamate al metodo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>sul provider per determinare la presenza di dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page has personalization data associated with it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la pagina contiene i dati di personalizzazione associati. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'ambito di personalizzazione predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà rappresenta l'ambito di personalizzazione predefinito che deve essere utilizzato per l'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo in assenza di precedenti conoscenze sull'ambito corretto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà non è impostata in modo esplicito, il valore predefinito per la restituzione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>ambito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata solo prima del completamento dei <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means InitialScope must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: In pratica, ciò significa InitialScope deve essere impostato nel markup della pagina sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile impostare questa proprietà durante il `PreInit` fase del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the default personalization scope of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> che indica l'ambito di personalizzazione predefinito dell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di impostare questa proprietà su un valore diverso da quello corrente dopo aver associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>metodo è stato completato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a value of InitialScope that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di impostare un valore di InitialScope che non è un membro del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la personalizzazione è abilitata e che è stati caricati correttamente i dati di personalizzazione per questa istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Prima di caricare i dati di personalizzazione, questa proprietà restituirà sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, questa proprietà restituirà `false` durante il `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: After the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called), this property will then return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo completato correttamente (durante il quale il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metodo viene chiamato), questa proprietà restituirà quindi `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è un alias accessibile pubblicamente per il metodo protetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la personalizzazione sia abilitata per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> dati di istanza e la personalizzazione sono stata caricata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la personalizzazione è abilitata e che è stati caricati correttamente i dati di personalizzazione per questa istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If the personalization feature is enabled (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called).
trans-unit.target: Se è abilitata la funzionalità di personalizzazione (se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>è impostata su `true`), il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>istanza viene considerata inizializzata immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo completato correttamente (durante il quale il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metodo viene chiamato).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Prima di caricare i dati di personalizzazione, questa proprietà restituisce sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la personalizzazione viene inizializzata per questa istanza. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'utente corrente è autorizzato a modificare le informazioni sullo stato.

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: La prima volta, che questa proprietà viene chiamata, viene memorizzato nella cache il risultato di determinare il diritto dell'utente per modificare lo stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dizionario viene modificato dopo la prima volta, questa proprietà viene chiamata, non vengono riflesse nelle chiamate successive a questa proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'utente è autorizzato a modificare le informazioni sullo stato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes personalization.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza la personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il punto di ingresso principale per inizializzare le informazioni sulla personalizzazione per conto di padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato durante l'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, this method will never be called.
trans-unit.target: In genere, se è stata disabilitata la personalizzazione nell'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo, questo metodo non verrà mai chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> page markup or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property, is obtained.
trans-unit.target: Nel corso di questo metodo, si verificano le inizializzazioni seguenti: - riferimento al provider di personalizzazioni predefinito o il provider personalizzato indicato nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>markup della pagina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>proprietà, viene ottenuto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: - The provider is called to determine the user capabilities (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: -Il provider viene chiamato per determinare le funzionalità di utente (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) per l'utente attualmente in esecuzione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) and stored within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: -Lo stato di personalizzazione per la combinazione di pagina/utente/ambito corrente viene caricato dall'archivio dati sottostante dal provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) e archiviati all'interno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -L'ambito di personalizzazione per l'oggetto corrente pagina/utente/ambito è determinato dal provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il risultato di questa operazione può essere diverso dal valore del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'ambito restituito da questo metodo viene utilizzato come valore per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the Load method is called directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>verrà generata l'eccezione a causa di personalizzazione non sia abilitata solo se il carico viene chiamato direttamente.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione di ASP.NET, viene effettivamente chiamato un metodo di supporto interno per eseguire il caricamento e terminato automaticamente se la personalizzazione non è stata abilitata per la pagina.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> istanza per l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: I provider di personalizzazioni sottostante non è riuscito a inizializzare perché non è stato possibile trovare un provider predefinito o perché si è verificato un errore durante il tentativo di inizializzare un provider di personalizzazioni.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> istanza di un'autorizzazione utente per modificare lo stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "modifyState" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il diritto utente è rappresentato dalla stringa "modifyState" nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del provider per la personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce il valore impostato per questa proprietà nella dichiarazione della pagina.

trans-unit.source: If this property was not set, it returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà non è stata impostata, restituisce <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, la pagina utilizza il provider di personalizzazioni specificato nel file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata solo prima del completamento dei <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This means the ProviderName property must be set in the page declaration on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che la proprietà ProviderName deve essere impostata nella dichiarazione di pagina il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile impostare questa proprietà durante il `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del provider di personalizzazioni.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di impostare questa proprietà su un valore diverso da quello corrente dopo il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>completamento del metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Reimposta i dati di personalizzazione della pagina corrente, un ambito e un utente nell'archivio dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo reimposta i dati di personalizzazione della pagina corrente, un ambito e un utente nell'archivio dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Come effetto collaterale della reimpostazione, la pagina attualmente in esecuzione viene nuovamente eseguita da un <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>chiamare.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo trasferimento esegue nuovamente la pagina corrente come una `GET` richiesta indipendentemente dalla modalità la pagina richiesta originariamente.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere chiamato in qualsiasi momento.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the ResetPersonalizationState method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, questo metodo chiama il metodo ResetPersonalizationState nel provider.

trans-unit.source: After data is successfully reset, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Una volta completata la reimpostazione dei dati, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is used elsewhere by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene utilizzata in un' posizione per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>per ignorare l'estrazione di dati di personalizzazione dalle proprietà del controllo dell'istanza e il salvataggio se i dati sono già stati reimpostati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> istanza non può fare riferimento a un provider di personalizzazioni valida.

trans-unit.source: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Salva i dati di personalizzazione della pagina corrente, un ambito e un utente nell'archivio dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato durante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, il metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>metodo sul provider.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di salvare i dati di personalizzazione quando l'utente attualmente in esecuzione non dispone della funzionalità denominata <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>(all'interno dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>istanza) comporta un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected Save method directly.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che ciò potrebbe essere true solo se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo denominato protetto Save (metodo) direttamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione di ASP.NET, viene effettivamente chiamato un metodo di supporto interno per eseguire il salvataggio e terminato automaticamente se l'utente attualmente in esecuzione non dispone dei diritti per modificare i dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ambito di personalizzazione per l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore è inizialmente impostato in base al valore restituito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore può essere modificato chiamando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo rappresenta l'ambito utilizzato per l'applicazione e l'estrazione delle informazioni di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di questa proprietà potrebbe differire dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance indicating the scope of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> che indica l'ambito dell'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Contrassegna l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo con i dati di personalizzazione che sono stata modificata (è "dirty").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>è impostata su `true`, questo metodo contrassegna l'elemento padre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo come "dirty".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: A seconda di dettagli di implementazione di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>istanza del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, questo metodo può richiamare i controlli di sicurezza e controlli autorizzazione sicurezza dall'accesso di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo tiene traccia dello stato "dirty" internamente ed espone "dirty" della gestione tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>proprietà anziché tramite questo metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato caricato alcun dato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Contrassegna il controllo di Web part specificato con i dati di personalizzazione che sono stata modificata (è "dirty").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>è impostata su `true`, questo metodo contrassegna il controllo di Web part specificato come "dirty".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: A seconda di dettagli di implementazione di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>istanza del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, questo metodo può richiamare i controlli di sicurezza e controlli autorizzazione sicurezza dall'accesso di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di Web part deve essere contrassegnato come "dirty".

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tentativo di contrassegnare come un controllo Web part che non è gestito dall'elemento padre "dirty" <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato caricato alcun dato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se i dati di personalizzazione della pagina corrente sono stati reimpostati (ad esempio, una richiesta effettuata per eliminare i dati di personalizzazione dall'archivio dati sottostante).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è impostata su `true`, indica che lo stato di personalizzazione per la pagina corrente è stato reimpostato e l'estrazione dei dati di personalizzazione dei controlli e le successive operazioni di salvataggio devono essere ignorata.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente, questa proprietà viene impostata automaticamente su `true` dall'infrastruttura di personalizzazione se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che anche se non sono previste restrizioni su quando è possibile impostare questa proprietà, la proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` nelle versioni precedenti al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento abbia effetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo stato di personalizzazione per la pagina corrente è stato reimpostato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> or from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Attiva l'ambito di personalizzazione della pagina corrente da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> o da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di alternare ambito di personalizzazione della pagina attualmente in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Tale operazione comporta un <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>tornare alla pagina corrente in esecuzione.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non esegue alcuna operazione se viene chiamato durante l'esportazione o importazione di un controllo Web part è in corso.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica una richiesta di ambito di attivazione/disattivazione per una pagina in cui è stata inviata tramite un `POST` richiesta, quindi eventuali valori di stringa di query verranno mantenuti durante il trasferimento; i parametri di stringa di query non vengono mantenuti se la pagina è stata inviata tramite un `GET` richiesta.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di passare a un ambito che non è definito nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Tecnicamente, questa situazione non dovrebbe mai verificarsi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il set di funzionalità di utente da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> concesse all'utente corrente.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"></xref> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>contenente il set di funzionalità utente concesse all'utente corrente o una stringa vuota <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"> </xref> se l'utente è anonimo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza dell'elemento padre corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> associato a questo controllo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo associato a questa istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.
